Description.Text: Location This hotel is located in Montevideo, opposite the Punta Carretas shopping centre and close to Pocitos Beach and the World Trade Center. Nearby attractions also include Montevideo centenary stadium and more shopping. There is a bus station about 10 minutes’ drive away. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 65 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and a safe make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A TV room is also among the amenities at the establishment. A garage can be used for parking. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. The accommodation units each feature a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A microwave and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Leisure options at the establishment include a gym, a sauna and a steam bath, or for a fee, massage treatments. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner and B & B. The establishment additionally offers special deals. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.

This hotel is located in Montevideo, opposite the Punta Carretas shopping centre and close to Pocitos Beach and the World Trade Center. Nearby attractions also include Montevideo centenary stadium and more shopping. There is a bus station about 10 minutes’ drive away.

All accommodation units feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. The accommodation units each feature a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A microwave and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and a radio. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer.

The establishment comprises a total of 65 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and a safe make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A TV room is also among the amenities at the establishment. A garage can be used for parking. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry.
A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Leisure options at the establishment include a gym, a sauna and a steam bath, or for a fee, massage treatments.
Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner and B & B. The establishment additionally offers special deals.
The following credit cards are accepted at the establishment: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
